company_description: GoCardless is a fintech company that offers online payment solutions for businesses, specializing in recurring payments and direct debits to help companies automate and streamline their payment processes.
founders: Hiroki Takeuchi, Matt Robinson, Tom Blomfield
seed_investors: YC, SVA, Start Fund, Passion Capital, Accel
embedding_text: GoCardless is a fintech company that offers online payment solutions for businesses, specializing in recurring payments and direct debits to help companies automate and streamline their payment processes.
